main event: Two lights, one red and one blue, were observed traversing the ground and shooting up into the sky in Golden Valley, Minnesota on January 2, 1959.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes.,The red light was seen moving across the ground before shooting up into the sky, while the blue light remained in sight.,The report suggests that the conclusion could be astronomical in nature.,The sighting occurred early in the morning at 9:20 AM.,There are indications that a passerby observed the blue light still visible at the time of the report.
sighted object: two lights, one red and one blue
witness description: No specific witnesses were confirmed in the report.
